name: creocoder/yii2-flysystem
description: The flysystem extension for the Yii framework

suggest.creocoder/yii2-flysystem-aws-s3-v2: Allow you to use AWS S3 SDK v2 filesystem
suggest.creocoder/yii2-flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Allow you to use AWS S3 SDK v3 filesystem
suggest.creocoder/yii2-flysystem-dropbox: Allow you to use Dropbox filesystem
suggest.creocoder/yii2-flysystem-copy: Allow you to use Copy filesystem
suggest.creocoder/yii2-flysystem-rackspace: Allow you to use Rackspace filesystem
suggest.creocoder/yii2-flysystem-webdav: Allow you to use WebDAV filesystem
suggest.creocoder/yii2-flysystem-ziparchive: Allow you to use ZipArchive filesystem
